ui:msg.description: Company History > Main title
Company History > Company History main paragraph 1

p.ui:msg: ArcBees became a corporation in July of 2010 to meet growing demand for professional support for GWT-Platform The idea was particularly aimed at answering to the new needs of SMEs of a Web in constant evolution. Since, the hive is growing and the company has won some prizes for his leadership and startup program. Today, the vision of our bees tends towards reality: revolutionary web applications come to market.

ui:msg.description: Company History > Company History main paragraph 2

p.ui:msg: So, the mission is to be an active and influential member of the open source community, while offering simple solutions and products which draw on cloud technologies. The company promises to make available new technologies for experts as well as neophytes, while sharing his knowledge with other developers.

ui:msg.description: Company History > Objectives Subtitle
Company History > Objectives > High Quality Applications

li.ui:msg: Deliver applications which answer the highest industry quality criteria;

ui:msg.description: Company History > Objectives > Simplest interface and latest technologies

li.ui:msg: Assure clients with a pleasing experience thanks to products offering the simplest interface and which only use the latest technologies;

ui:msg.description: Company History > Objectives > Cloud Technologies

li.ui:msg: Profit from the advantages of cloud technologies in order to allow clients to answer automatically to demand fluctuation at the lowest cost;

ui:msg.description: Company History > Objectives > Mobiles Devices Migration
Company History > Objectives > Application Market

li.ui:msg: Encourage a rich ecosystem of developers to install a diversified application market, allowing companies to customize their web application.

ui:msg.description: Company History > Company History main paragraph 3

p.ui:msg: In order to anticipate and answer to the emergent needs, the products offered are innovative and open the way to setting up applications and services which were inaccessible or unknown to the general public. In that sense, ArcBees’s innovative wallet, combined to the invested efforts will rush the company towards the title of leader in the Web domain.

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key dates title
Company History > Key Dates > Offices expansion

li.ui:msg: June 2012 : ArcBees offices expand in Québec city

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key Dates > GWT steering committee

li.ui:msg: June 2012 : ArcBees joins GWT's steering committee at Google

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key Dates > Chris Goudreau business personality

li.ui:msg: May 2012 : The JDA of Québec appoints Christian Goudreau the business personality of the year

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key Dates > CLD prize

li.ui:msg: April 2012 : The CLD of Québec appoints ArcBees winner of the best technology business of the year

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key Dates > GWTP in Montreal

li.ui:msg: November 2011 : GTUTS invites ArcBees to present GWTP in Montréal

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key Dates > Devtech50 finalist

li.ui:msg: November 2011 : ArcBees is finalist at Devtech50 contest

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key Dates > GWTP in Nantes

li.ui:msg: November 2011 : GTUTS invites ArcBees to present GWTP in Nantes

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key Dates > Office opening

li.ui:msg: October 2011 : ArcBees moved into its first office in Québec City

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key Dates > GWTP in San Francisco

li.ui:msg: May 2011 : Google invites ArcBees to present GWTP at Google I/O in San Francisco

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key Dates > CQE Prize in Quebec

li.ui:msg: April 2011 : The CQE of Quebec appoints ArcBees winner of the best startup in technology category (local step)

ui:msg.description: Company History > Key Dates > ArcBees Inc.
Company History > Key Dates > GWTP 0.1
